title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Directly Download
description:
Picking up the threads from the dramatic conclusion of Dragon Age: Inquisition, Dragon Age: The Veilguard thrusts players into a world nine years later. Solas, the enigmatic elven god and former ally, is poised to shatter the Veil, a mystical barrier separating the mortal realm from the Fade. Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse
Rather than directly confronting this imminent threat, the game introduces a new protagonist, Rook, who joins forces with the charismatic Varric Tethras to disrupt Solasâ€™s plan. However, their intervention unleashes an even greater evil, forcing Rook to assemble a diverse and unlikely team to save Thedas.
A Smaller, More Intimate Adventure
Unlike its predecessor, The Veilguard takes a more intimate approach. Instead of leading a sprawling organization, Rook leads a small, tight-knit group of companions. Each character is distinct and memorable, offering unique perspectives and skills.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X* (see notes)
